기본정보.수업목표: This course covers fundamentals of signal and system analysis, focusing on representations of discrete-time and continuous-time signals (singularity functions, complex exponentials and geometrics, Fourier representations, Laplace and Z transforms, sampling) and representations of linear, time-invariant systems (difference and differential equations, block diagrams, system functions, poles and zeros, convolution, impulse and step responses, frequency responses).
기본정보.저자: Alan V. Oppenheim / A.S.Willsky / S.H. Nawab

평가방법.√: 평가방법 조정(대독, 구두응답, 도우미 대필 답안작성 등)
